
[:platform_system == "Darwin"]
pyobjc-core
pyobjc-framework-CoreBluetooth
pyobjc-framework-libdispatch

[:platform_system == "Linux"]
dbus-next

[:platform_system == "Windows" and python_version < "3.9.0"]
pythonnet

[:platform_system == "Windows" and python_version >= "3.9.0"]
winrt>=1.0.21033.1

[pythonnet]
pythonnet>=2.5.1

[winrt]
winrt>=1.0.21033.1
